Medium: Illustrated book with 4 etchings (2 with drypoint and/or engraving) and 3 drypoints, printed in black, and 4 etched or engraved reproductions; 2 supplementary suites: 1 printed in black and 1 printed in color; and 1 added duplicate signed etching by Jacques Villon
Dimensions: irreg. page: 10 x 8 1/16" (25 x 20.5 cm); prints:  various dimensions.
Artist: Various Artists, Jacques Villon, Pablo Picasso, Francis Picabia, Jean Metzinger, Fernand Léger, Marie Laurencin, Juan Gris, Albert Gleizes, Marcel Duchamp, André Derain, Georges Braque
Title: Du Cubisme
